Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
